name: A Chaotic Mindset
description:
A Chaotic Mindset is a game about putting the right words with a chosen genre. The game at the start gives you the total amount of words that you need to put into the "Thought Cabinet". 

Things such as distractions or words that don't fit with the genre will get in your way and you'll have to take care of them: 

Wrong words need to be put into the trash in order for new words to spawn.

Distractions can be gotten rid of by pressing E multiple times.

Sometimes a Word Safe will spawn and in order to unlock it you will need to play a minigame. Word Safes have more value than regular Word Blocks.

Once that word amount is reached or the timer hits 0, the game ends.

Made for the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam.
